C M P 

C

CityGUI3 - Class in <Unnamed>
CityGUI3 inherits from JComponent and implements MouseMotionListener and MouseListener; it creates a map with a city hall and a school along with police officers, teachers, and kids which can all be placed in either the city hall or the school.
CityGUI3(Image, Image, Image, Image, Image, Image) - Constructor for class CityGUI3
This creates an object of the class with the abilites described in the class description.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class CityGUI3
Creates images by grabbing them from the browser and creates a frame and customizes it
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class CityGUI3
 
mouseDragged(MouseEvent) - Method in class CityGUI3
Moves certain images accross the screen based on whether it can be dragged.
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class CityGUI3
 
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class CityGUI3
 
mouseMoved(MouseEvent) - Method in class CityGUI3
 
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class CityGUI3
Potentially allows certain images to be either viewed or dragged if clicked
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class CityGUI3
Displays stats of an image depending on whether it has not been dragged and has been pressed.

P

paint(Graphics) - Method in class CityGUI3
Paints the frame with the background, city hall, school, police, teacher, and kid images.
